issue_name: Multiple Vulnerabilities in Palo Alto Networks Virtual NGFW on RUGGEDCOM APE1808 devices before V11.1.2-h3

1.description: Contact customer support to receive patch and update information for upgrading Palo Alto Networks Virtual NGFW to V11.1.2-h3.

2.command: Upgrade Palo Alto Networks Virtual NGFW
2.description: Upgrade Palo Alto Networks Virtual NGFW to V11.1.2-h3.
